hero.subtitle: Complete platform for managing foreign trade processes, from registration to clearance.
hero.portalSubtitle: Centralize requests, processes, documents and shipping status in one place.

features.responsiveText: Access GECOM from any device, with dashboards and information optimized for desktop, tablet and mobile.
features.reportsText1: Track costs, deadlines, process status and operations performance with updated reports.
features.reportsText2: Quickly view shipments, releases, deliveries and key indicators of your logistics flow.
features.formsText1: Reduce errors in client, process and document registration with validations and standardized fields.
features.integrationsText: Connect GECOM to other systems to further automate the information flow.
features.emailNotificationsText: Notify clients and partners about status updates and important process events.
features.strategicIndicatorsText: Charts and metrics that help you make fast and safe decisions about your operations.

sections.endToEndTitle: End-to-end management of import and export operations in a single system.

steps.alignmentMeetingText: We understand your processes, volumes and operational details to configure GECOM according to your needs.
steps.implementationText: Configuration, training and follow-up on the first processes to ensure everything works as expected.

testimonials.quote1: GECOM gave us full visibility into import and export processes. Today we track deadlines and costs in real time and can be much more proactive with our clients.
testimonials.quote2: We managed to integrate our operation with GECOM and today we have much more control over shipments from mutual clients.
testimonials.quote3: Centralizing information reduces rework and email back-and-forth. Everyone knows exactly what stage each process is in.
testimonials.quote4: GECOM helped standardize the information flow between our team in Brazil and partners abroad.

contact.title: Ask questions, request a demo, or learn more about how GECOM can help your operation.
